verses.text: After \w the|strong="H3068"\w* plague \w had|strong="H3068"\w* ended, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Eleazar \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*,

“\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w census|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w older|strong="H4605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H1004"\w* serve \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1696"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w across|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Eleazar \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* issued \w the|strong="H5921"\w* instruction,

“\w Take|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* census \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w older|strong="H4605"\w*,\f + \fr 26:4 \ft Take a census of the men is implied but not included in the Hebrew; see verse 2.\f* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.” \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w these|strong="H4605"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: The Tribe of Reuben

\w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. These \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*: The Hanochite clan from Hanoch, the Palluite clan from Pallu,
the Hezronite clan from Hezron, and the Carmite clan from Carmi.

These \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7206"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* registration \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 43,730.
Now \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pallu|strong="H6396"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* Eliab,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliab \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nemuel|strong="H5241"\w*, \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiram. \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiram, chosen \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* fought \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* followers \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H5327"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* earth \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w its|strong="H1961"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w swallowed|strong="H1104"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* along \w with|strong="H6310"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, whose followers \w died|strong="H4194"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* fire consumed 250 men. \w They|strong="H6310"\w* \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w warning|strong="H5251"\w* \w sign|strong="H5251"\w*.

However, \w the|strong="H4191"\w* line \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w out|strong="H3808"\w*. The Tribe of Simeon

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: The Nemuelite clan from Nemuel,\f + \fr 26:12 \ft Nemuel is another name for Jemuel; see Genesis 46:10.\f* the Jaminite clan from Jamin, the Jachinite clan from Jachin,
the Zerahite clan from Zerah,\f + \fr 26:13 \ft Zerah is a variant of Zohar; see Genesis 46:10 and Exodus 6:15.\f* and the Shaulite clan from Shaul.

\w These|strong="H8147"\w* \w were|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8099"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* there \w were|strong="H4940"\w* 22,200 \w men|strong="H8147"\w*. The Tribe of Gad

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: The Zephonite clan from Zephon, the Haggite clan from Haggi, the Shunite clan from Shuni,
the Oznite clan from Ozni, the Erite clan from Eri,
the Arodite clan from Arod,\f + \fr 26:17 \ft SP and Syriac Arodi; see Genesis 46:16.\f* and the Arelite clan from Areli.

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H6485"\w* registration \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 40,500. The Tribe of Judah

\w The|strong="H4191"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w Er|strong="H6147"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Onan, \w but|strong="H4191"\w* \w they|strong="H3063"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

These \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: The Shelanite clan from Shelah, the Perezite clan from Perez, and the Zerahite clan from Zerah.
And these were the descendants of Perez: the Hezronite clan from Hezron and the Hamulite clan from Hamul.

These \w were|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H6485"\w* registration \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 76,500. The Tribe of Issachar

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: The Tolaite clan from Tola, the Punite clan from Puvah,\f + \fr 26:23 \ft SP, LXX, Vulgate, and Syriac the Puite clan from Puah; see 1 Chronicles 7:1.\f*
the Jashubite clan from Jashub,\f + \fr 26:24 \ft Jashub is a variant of Job; see Genesis 46:13.\f* and the Shimronite clan from Shimron.

These \w were|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H6485"\w* registration \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 64,300. The Tribe of Zebulun

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: The Seredite clan from Sered, the Elonite clan from Elon, and the Jahleelite clan from Jahleel.

These \w were|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* Zebulun, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H6485"\w* registration \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 60,500. The Tribe of Manasseh

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* included \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim.

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*: The Machirite clan from Machir, the father of Gilead, and the Gileadite clan from Gilead.
These were the descendants of Gilead: the Iezerite clan from Iezer,\f + \fr 26:30 \ft Iezer is a variant of Abiezer; see Joshua 17:2.\f* the Helekite clan from Helek,
the Asrielite clan from Asriel, the Shechemite clan from Shechem,
the Shemidaite clan from Shemida, and the Hepherite clan from Hepher.
Now Zelophehad son of Hepher had no sons but only daughters. The names of his daughters were Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.

\w These|strong="H8147"\w* \w were|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H6485"\w* registration \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 52,700. The Tribe of Ephraim

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: The Shuthelahite clan from Shuthelah, the Becherite clan from Becher, and the Tahanite clan from Tahan.
And the descendants of Shuthelah were the Eranite clan from Eran.

\w These|strong="H8147"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H6485"\w* registration \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 32,500. \w These|strong="H8147"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*. The Tribe of Benjamin

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* \w their|strong="H1144"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: The Belaite clan from Bela, the Ashbelite clan from Ashbel, the Ahiramite clan from Ahiram,
the Shuphamite clan from Shupham,\f + \fr 26:39 \ft A few MT manuscripts, SP, Vulgate, and Syriac (see also LXX); most MT manuscripts Shephupham\f* and the Huphamite clan from Hupham.
And the descendants of Bela from Ard and Naaman were the Ardite clan from Ard \f + \fr 26:40 \ft SP and Vulgate (see also LXX); MT does not include from Ard.\f* and the Naamite clan from Naaman.

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H6485"\w* registration \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 45,600. The Tribe of Dan

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* \w their|strong="H1835"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: The Shuhamite clan from Shuham. These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w them|strong="H6485"\w* \w were|strong="H4940"\w* Shuhamite \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* registration \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 64,400. The Tribe of Asher

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Asher \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: The Imnite clan from Imnah, the Ishvite clan from Ishvi, and the Beriite clan from Beriah.
And these were the descendants of Beriah: the Heberite clan from Heber and the Malchielite clan from Malchiel.
And the name of Asher’s daughter was Serah.

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Asher, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H6485"\w* registration \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 53,400. The Tribe of Naphtali

These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* their \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: The Jahzeelite clan from Jahzeel, the Gunite clan from Guni,
the Jezerite clan from Jezer, and the Shillemite clan from Shillem.

These \w were|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H6485"\w* registration \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 45,400.
These \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* 601,730 \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H6485"\w*. Inheritance by Lot
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w The|strong="H8034"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w to|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* tribes \w as|strong="H5159"\w* \w an|strong="H5159"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, according \w to|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w Increase|strong="H7235"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w large|strong="H7227"\w* tribe \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w decrease|strong="H4591"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w small|strong="H4592"\w* \w one|strong="H6310"\w*; \w each|strong="H5414"\w* tribe \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w receive|strong="H5414"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* those registered.

Indeed, \w the|strong="H5157"\w* \w land|strong="H1486"\w* must \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w by|strong="H8034"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*; \w they|strong="H8034"\w* \w shall|strong="H8034"\w* \w receive|strong="H5157"\w* \w their|strong="H5157"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* according \w to|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H5157"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H5157"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w their|strong="H5157"\w* fathers.

Each \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5159"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w larger|strong="H7227"\w* \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w smaller|strong="H4592"\w* tribes.” The Levites Numbered

Now \w these|strong="H3881"\w* \w were|strong="H3881"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w by|strong="H6485"\w* \w their|strong="H6485"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*: The Gershonite clan from Gershon, the Kohathite clan from Kohath, and the Merarite clan from Merari.

\w These|strong="H3881"\w* \w were|strong="H3881"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: The Libnite clan, the Hebronite clan, the Mahlite clan, the Mushite clan, and the Korahite clan. Now \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* \w was|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*’s wife \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jochebed|strong="H3115"\w*. She \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w also|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. \w To|strong="H3205"\w* \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w* she \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* Aaron, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w their|strong="H4714"\w* sister \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*.
\w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*, Abihu, Eleazar, \w and|strong="H5070"\w* Ithamar \w were|strong="H3205"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* Aaron,

\w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Abihu \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w unauthorized|strong="H2114"\w* \f + \fr 26:61 \ft Or strange\f* fire \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* registration \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H1121"\w* totaled 23,000, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w*; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*. Only Caleb and Joshua Remain
